complianceRequirements.title: Maintain CRAR >= 9%
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain minimum Capital to Risk-weighted Assets Ratio of 9% at all times
complianceRequirements.notes: CRAR at 10.8% as of Dec 2025. Monitor capital adequacy.

complianceRequirements.title: Tier 1 Capital Minimum (6%)
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain minimum Tier 1 capital of 6% of risk-weighted assets
complianceRequirements.notes: Tier 1 capital at 7.2%. Within regulatory limits.

complianceRequirements.title: Capital Conservation Buffer (1.0% for Tier 2)
complianceRequirements.description: Build and maintain capital conservation buffer as per UCB tier
complianceRequirements.notes: CCB maintained at 1.2%.

complianceRequirements.title: Risk Management Committee Constitution
complianceRequirements.description: Constitute Risk Management Committee with minimum 3 directors
complianceRequirements.notes: RMC constituted with 4 directors. Quarterly meetings held.

complianceRequirements.title: Risk Management Policy
complianceRequirements.description: Establish comprehensive risk management policy covering all risk types
complianceRequirements.notes: Policy approved by Board. Annual review pending.

complianceRequirements.title: Risk Appetite Framework
complianceRequirements.description: Document and implement risk appetite statement approved by Board
complianceRequirements.notes: Risk appetite statement drafted. Board approval pending.

complianceRequirements.title: Standardized Approach for Credit Risk
complianceRequirements.description: Calculate credit risk capital using standardized approach
complianceRequirements.notes: Credit RWA calculated monthly. Returns submitted on time.

complianceRequirements.title: NPA Classification and Reporting
complianceRequirements.description: Classify NPAs as per RBI norms and maintain adequate provisions
complianceRequirements.notes: NPA at 4.2%. PCR maintained at 65%.

complianceRequirements.title: Large Exposure Monitoring
complianceRequirements.description: Monitor single and group borrower exposures within prescribed limits
complianceRequirements.notes: Two exposures接近 single borrower limit. Monitoring weekly.

complianceRequirements.title: Interest Rate Risk Management (ALM)
complianceRequirements.description: Implement Asset Liability Management framework
complianceRequirements.notes: ALM policy not approved. Gap analysis incomplete.

complianceRequirements.title: ALCO Constitution and Functioning
complianceRequirements.description: Constitute Asset Liability Committee with defined responsibilities
complianceRequirements.notes: ALCO committee formation in process.

complianceRequirements.title: Board Composition and Fit & Proper
complianceRequirements.description: Ensure board composition complies with RBI norms and fit & proper criteria
complianceRequirements.notes: All directors meet fit & proper criteria. Annual verification complete.

complianceRequirements.title: Audit Committee Functioning
complianceRequirements.description: Constitute Audit Committee with majority independent directors
complianceRequirements.notes: Audit Committee meeting held quarterly. All findings reviewed.

complianceRequirements.title: Cyber Security Policy
complianceRequirements.description: Establish and implement comprehensive cyber security policy
complianceRequirements.notes: Policy exists but not Board approved. Annual review overdue.

complianceRequirements.title: Business Continuity Plan
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain tested Business Continuity Plan for critical operations
complianceRequirements.notes: BCP document exists. Annual DR testing not conducted in 2025.

complianceRequirements.title: Common Equity Tier 1 (CET1) Minimum
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain minimum CET1 capital of 3.5% of risk-weighted assets
complianceRequirements.notes: CET1 at 4.5%. Within regulatory limits.

complianceRequirements.title: Tier 2 Capital Limit
complianceRequirements.description: Ensure Tier 2 capital does not exceed 50% of Tier 1 capital
complianceRequirements.notes: Tier 2 at 45% of Tier 1. Within limit.

complianceRequirements.title: Provision Coverage Ratio
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain adequate provisions against NPAs as per RBI norms
complianceRequirements.notes: PCR at 68%. Above RBI minimum.

complianceRequirements.title: Credit Risk Assessment
complianceRequirements.description: Conduct comprehensive credit risk assessment for borrowers
complianceRequirements.notes: Credit appraisal process exists. Rating model needs update.

complianceRequirements.title: Independent Risk Management Function
complianceRequirements.description: Establish independent risk management function with adequate resources
complianceRequirements.notes: RM function exists. Resource gaps identified.

complianceRequirements.title: Risk-Based Supervision Implementation
complianceRequirements.description: Implement risk-based supervision framework including assessment
complianceRequirements.notes: RBS framework implemented. Returns submitted on time.

complianceRequirements.title: Board Committees Constitution
complianceRequirements.description: Constitute mandatory board committees including Audit and RMC
complianceRequirements.notes: All required committees constituted. Meeting minutes maintained.

complianceRequirements.title: Related Party Transactions
complianceRequirements.description: Identify, approve, and disclose related party transactions
complianceRequirements.notes: RPT policy exists. Disclosure process needs improvement.

complianceRequirements.title: Internal Audit Function
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain independent internal audit function covering all areas
complianceRequirements.notes: Internal audit plan executed. Quarterly reviews complete.

complianceRequirements.title: Chief Information Security Officer (CISO)
complianceRequirements.description: Appoint CISO responsible for information security governance
complianceRequirements.notes: CISO appointed and reporting to ED. Training completed.

complianceRequirements.title: Cyber Security Incident Reporting
complianceRequirements.description: Report cyber security incidents to RBI within stipulated timelines
complianceRequirements.notes: Incident reporting process established. No incidents reported.

complianceRequirements.title: IT Governance and Systems
complianceRequirements.description: Implement IT governance framework including IT policy and IT audit
complianceRequirements.notes: IT policy approved. IT audit backlog exists.

complianceRequirements.title: KYC Compliance
complianceRequirements.description: Conduct Know Your Customer procedures for all customers
complianceRequirements.notes: KYC process standardized. Annual reviews conducted.

complianceRequirements.title: AML Compliance
complianceRequirements.description: Implement Anti-Money Laundering framework including STR reporting
complianceRequirements.notes: AML policy approved. STR/CTR filings current.

complianceRequirements.title: Customer Service and Grievance Redressal
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain customer service standards and grievance mechanism

complianceRequirements.title: Ombudsman Scheme Compliance
complianceRequirements.description: Participate in RBI Ombudsman Scheme and display details

complianceRequirements.title: Pillar 3 Disclosures

complianceRequirements.title: Gold Loan Policy
complianceRequirements.description: Implement RBI guidelines for gold loans including LTV ratio
complianceRequirements.notes: LTV ratio maintained at 75%. Verification process in place.

complianceRequirements.title: Liquidity Management
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain adequate liquidity through LCR and contingency plan
complianceRequirements.notes: LCR calculated daily. Contingency plan needs update.

complianceRequirements.title: Investment Policy Compliance
complianceRequirements.description: Follow RBI investment policy including SLR maintenance
complianceRequirements.notes: SLR maintained at 18.5%. Investment returns filed.

complianceRequirements.title: Operational Risk Assessment
complianceRequirements.description: Assess operational risk capital using standardized approach
complianceRequirements.notes: Operational risk capital calculated. Returns submitted.

complianceRequirements.description: Implement operational risk management framework
complianceRequirements.notes: OR policy approved. Incident reporting needs improvement.

complianceRequirements.title: CRAR Reporting

complianceRequirements.title: NPA Reporting
complianceRequirements.description: Submit NPA returns including classification and provisioning

complianceRequirements.title: ALM Reporting
complianceRequirements.description: Submit ALM returns including gap analysis and liquidity
complianceRequirements.notes: ALM return submitted. Gap analysis needs enhancement.

complianceRequirements.title: Priority Sector Lending (PSL)
complianceRequirements.description: Meet PSL targets as per RBI norms
complianceRequirements.notes: PSL at 38% of ANBC. Slight shortfall in agriculture.

complianceRequirements.title: Loan Review Mechanism
complianceRequirements.description: Implement systematic loan review process for quality control
complianceRequirements.notes: Quarterly loan reviews conducted. Action plans implemented.

complianceRequirements.title: Deposit Insurance (DICGC)
complianceRequirements.description: Ensure all deposits covered under DICGC insurance

complianceRequirements.title: Cash Management Procedures
complianceRequirements.description: Implement robust cash management and strong room procedures

complianceRequirements.description: Implement comprehensive IT security policy and controls

complianceRequirements.description: Conduct board meetings as per RBI frequency requirements

complianceRequirements.description: Participate in clearing house operations for settlement

complianceRequirements.description: Maintain proper documentation for all loan accounts
